segments.advisor_message: Alright, let’s start with some basic information. Can you please provide me with your full name, including any middle names you might have, as well as how you prefer to be addressed?
segments.client_message: Sure, so my name is David James Smith, but I usually go by just David.

segments.advisor_message: Thank you, David. Now, could you share your date of birth and any personal information regarding your nationality or marital status?
segments.client_message: Yeah, I was born on 15-04-1985, and I'm actually British. As for my marital status, I'm currently single.
